availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin Franklin Bradford (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Bracken County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mildred Bradford. Married to Sarah T. Sterne on May 28, 1855. Father of Edwin Frazier Bradford. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 413B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 166
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 362A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 000272800, p. 109.
Find A Grave, "Edwin Franklin Bradford (1834-1900)," Memorial #119642041, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/119642041(accessed July 8, 2019).
